#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		long long int n,flag=0, t1=1, t2 =2,temp=0;
		cin>>n;
		if(n==1 || n==2)
		{
			flag=1;
		}
		else
		{
			while(n>t2)
			{
				temp = t1 + t2;
				t1 = t2;
				t2= temp;
				if(n==temp)
				{
					flag=1;
				}
			}
		}
		if(flag==1)
		cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
		cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
}
